channel.title: Azure CLI (az) Deployment on
channel.description: Recent content in Azure CLI (az) Deployment on

item.title: Example Walkthrough of Azure CLI (az) Deployment
item.description: Below walks through creating a brand new resource group, virtual network, subnets and associated resources needed to deploy a Trustgrid appliance using Azure CLI commands. This is rarely appropriate for production environments but demonstrates the process. It then walks through all the steps listed on the AZ CLI Deployment and shows the output of running the commands. The output below may be modified to obscure unique ids for security purposes and truncated due to the verbosity of some response.
